column5: Beachfront and near everything! - this is a beauty. The sound and view of the surf, 2 balconies - one for shore, one for fireworks display, a king (double-twin) bed, queen and pull out couch provide for up to 6; 1.5 bathrooms. Gated parking, private beach access, hot tub and pool as well secure WiFi, sauna, 24-hr security. For a weekend or long term stay, Beachfront Blessed is your place! No smoking, no pets, furniture rated to 250 lbs. Have a Blessed and Beachy day!
